forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun dips this afternoon over Downtown San Francisco, it casts a warm, golden hue across the bustling cityscape, the air refreshed by a gentle breeze that nudges the sails of boats in the bay. With a high near 67, the weather feels pleasantly mild, an invitation to emerge from the confines of home and explore the vibrant streets bathed in sunlight. The skies remain predominantly clear, though a few wispy clouds playfully drift by, hinting at the night’s return to partial clouds. The winds from the west southwest, brisk yet calming at 16 mph, add a touch of liveliness, perfect for those who relish the invigorating embrace of nature.

As evening approaches, temperatures will ease into a comfortable low of 54, making light layers a wise choice. A light sweater or a woven shawl will harmoniously complement the coolness, awkwardly flirting with a cozy warmth. The veil of the marine layer, subdued yet persistent, lingers towards the horizon, compelling you to cherish this moment outdoors before the fog rolls in. Consider a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or along the Embarcadero where the views stretch wide and the city breathes easy. Whether it’s wrapping up the day with a book at a café or simply taking in the world around you, today’s San Francisco offers a gentle reminder to savor the beauty of the everyday.
